intent_atoms.description: Propagate Decoder Failures Through Tolerant Parsing: Update streaming iteration to capture BoxHeaderDecoder failures, attach diagnostics to the current node, and continue traversal.
Continue traversal per the acceptance criteria tracked in DOCS/AI/Tolerance_Parsing/TODO.md.
VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts: Schedule macOS and iPadOS hardware verification to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Hardware verification must be scheduled only after confirming availability of required macOS and iPadOS devices.
Real-World Assets: Secure Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG‑H fixtures to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads once approvals land.
Licensing approvals must be obtained before assets can be secured.
Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance: Refresh snapshots and CLI fixtures whenever schema updates are an intentional change, using ISOINSPECTT...
